author: Fortune Editors
title: Watch The Breakdown, Fortune's New Live News Show | Fortune
text: Watch our new weekly news show, The Breakdown , for a quick dive into some of the week’s most compelling topics by reporters and editors from Fortune, Time , Money, and Sports Illustrated . This week’s broadcast includes a discussion of whether Starbucks closing its stores to give employees racial-based training is just a PR stunt. The show stars Neha Joy and streams weekly on Wednesdays at 3:30 p.m. Eastern.
